## unemployment

US Counties unemployment rate

#### Description 

This data comes from the https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/jsonp.php?filename=
us-counties-unemployment.json and is used in highmaps examples.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
unemployment
</code></pre>

#### Format

A data.frame with 3 variables and 3.216 observations.

#### Variables 

* ``code``: The county code.
* ``name``: The county name.
* ``value``: The unemployment.

#### Source
https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/jsonp.php?filename=us-counties-unemployment.
jsonuscountygeojson
